mapper.select: SELECT game_info.titlekr -- , game_info.game_league_id AS leagueId -- , game_info.game_entry_home -- , game_info.game_entry_away -- , game_info.begin_date , game_info.contentType , game_info.imageKr , game_info.imageKrSize , CASE WHEN D.lge_sport_id <> '' THEN D.lge_sport_id ELSE '' END AS sportId , CASE WHEN D.lge_sport_name <> '' THEN D.lge_sport_name ELSE '' END AS sportName , CASE WHEN C.lge_league_id <> '' THEN C.lge_league_id ELSE '' END AS leagueId , CASE WHEN C.lge_league_name <> '' THEN C.lge_league_name ELSE '' END AS leagueName , IFNULL(E.lge_team_id, '' ) AS teamTypeIdHome , IFNULL(E.lge_team_name, '' ) AS teamTypeNameHome , IFNULL(F.lge_team_id, '' ) AS teamTypeIdAway , IFNULL(F.lge_team_name, '' ) AS teamTypeNameAway , ROUND(UNIX_TIMESTAMP( game_info.begin_date )) AS startTime , ROUND(UNIX_TIMESTAMP( game_info.begin_date )) + 18000 AS endTime FROM ( SELECT A.title AS titlekr, A.img_url AS imageKr, '1280' AS imageKrSize, B.game_league_id, B.game_type_id, B.game_entry_home, B.game_entry_away, B.begin_date, 'sporting_event' AS contentType FROM spotvnow_renewal.lives A INNER JOIN spotvnow_renewal.game_info B ON A.game_id = B.id WHERE A.status IN ( 0, 1 ) AND SUBSTR( B.BEGIN_DATE, 1, 10) IN ( DATE(date_add( NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY )), DATE( NOW() ), DATE(date_add( NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY )), DATE( NOW() ) ) UNION ALL SELECT A.title AS titlekr, A.img_url AS imageKr, '1920' AS imageKrSize, B.game_league_id, B.game_type_id, B.game_entry_home, B.game_entry_away, B.begin_date, 'sproting_vod' AS contentType FROM spotvnow_renewal.videos A INNER JOIN spotvnow_renewal.game_info B ON A.game_info_id = B.id where SUBSTR( B.BEGIN_DATE, 1, 10) IN ( DATE(date_add( NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY )), DATE(date_add( NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY )) ) and A.type = 1 ) game_info INNER JOIN spotvnow_renewal.lge_smart_alarm_game_league C ON game_info.game_league_id = C.game_league_id INNER JOIN spotvnow_renewal.lge_smart_alarm_game_type D ON game_info.game_type_id = D.game_type_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM spotvnow_renewal.lge_smart_alarm_tname_match WHERE game_entry_id <> 1 OR id = 101 ) E ON game_info.game_entry_home = E.game_entry_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM spotvnow_renewal.lge_smart_alarm_tname_match WHERE game_entry_id <> 1 OR id = 101 ) F ON game_info.game_entry_away = F.game_entry_id
